locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I recently stopped at this Love’s for a 10-hour break and found the area to be generally decent. The truck stop is clean, with plenty of options for food and parking. The staff inside the store are polite and helpful; however, the shop …
Store is fairly clean, employees are fake friendly and all drinks I wanted were out.  Employee just looked at me and walked away when I asked if there was a replacement available.

Trashy place. Every drink in the fountain was out and when they were told they tell a customer he needs to get a bottle from the cooler. Not friendly at all. Bathroom smells like ammonia and the whole floor is soaked. Toilets looked like they got brushed out about a year ago

locations.title: Sprint Mart
locations.content: Sprint Mart may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I love Sprint Mart! This store always has amazing food Hot and ready. Bathrooms are clean and staff is good when all there. You can tell there understaffed. Lines out the door on trucker and regular customer sides. It takes 15 min or better just to stop for gas and thats on a good day. Staff is very nice just not enough of.

Always love going to this Sprint Mart. Lots of selection and always clean, organized, and nice inside. And always well lit up so you can see things good. Staff is always very friendly and helpful. Management sure knows what they’re doin! Keep it up!!
One of the nicest Sprints I've been in! Always very clean, REAL good chicken & the sweetest cashiers! The manager is also one of the most helpful & kind people!
Nice clean place, with well stocked shelves and clean restrooms

Stephanie and her staff were very friendly and provided excellent customer service. With road construction going on causing wait and traffic delays, I know that the store will be clean and service will be quick to have me on my way.

The store may be clean but the shower is not and was not. It had water bugs and shower curtains was nasty. All you have to do is throw them in the washer bc they are cloth. I will mor never shower here again

Sprint mart is great. Ours is called Dutch village... it's the closest to my house. We stop and buy lunch.  We love the island ice flavored drinks... fill up our cars... get a car wash. Just a quick stop with lots of options.

showerReviews.reviewText: Plenty of free parking, although it is a rock lot. Good homemade food, reasonably priced. Clean shower.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Excellent locals told me about this place I needed to shut down during to weather
Hot meals, shower, clean
Affordable store prices
Definitely a go to

… nice people work there decent prices and really good food kitchen specials food is served fast and hot  keep up the great work and fuel and gas prices are reasonably and fairly priced  also exceptionally clean place to eat and shower !!

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … It is the way how stupid lazy personal  brought their own rules and anger and put this toxic attitude to people. Shower woman was the best BTW, don't know her name but I'm grateful for clean shower, extra towel and respectful attitude, …

… only have one men's urinal by the fuel island and doesn't work.  The restrooms seem third world.  So many products out of stock.  The shower is so small you have to put your stuff on the floor.  The manager of this place should be fired.

Showers dirty, dirty towels, and lady working over night at the front says she’s not supposed to be in the shower area. Dirty towels hanging everywhere in my shower, but they still have no problem charging $17. Then another driver and I …
Dirty showers …
bad attitude of the staff, they tried to extort money, although I had a receipt that allowed me to use the shower,

The showers are nice, spacious and clean for the most part. However, when you are going to the shower it is empty but once you are actually in the shower the porter guys come out of nowhere and stand outside the door which make you …

Absolutely a horrible nightmare!! The showers are not that clean but the real problem is the water pressure and the temperature. If you like a cold dripping shower to refresh yourself for the day ahead then this is your place. The employees …

**Sparkly clean!** I love stepping into a shower room and smelling bleach and other cleaning products. Let's me know I'm gonna enjoy this one! Thank you  TA shower stall cleaner person for giving me a restful pit stop at the end of my day! …
Got 80 gallons of fuel here today.  Laundry room and shower were clean.  They also have a nice open area with comfy chairs near the food court. Washing machines and dryers accept credit cards.

… clean this place is. I've never seen a truck stop so clean and shiny... BUT then I went to take my shower and these worm looking things was all over the shower floor. Not sure I've never seen anything like it. Are they parasites. They are …

showerReviews.reviewText: … is no overnight parking and if I don't move than Loves will tow me. As a OTR pro driver I will not shop , buy a shower or fuel at this Loves ever again. As for other drivers I hope you will boycott this establishment  till they treat all …
6pm, still plenty of parking. Store is clean, shower and bathroom were clean, food is good. Have seen the local police department patrol the lot a couple times now.
good place to stop and take a shower.friendly poeple

locations.title: Sherman Travel Center
locations.content: Sherman Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … Back again after a long time.  The chicken wrap was amazing with fries.  Fresh!   A great place, but a bit disappointed with the showers.  Warm shower not hot.  Out of soap and shampoo.  The breakfast biscuit was a little egg.  Hashbrown …

For $15 you get a nice hot shower. Shower rooms are super clean and the water pressure is really good they also have a decent hot food selection. This is always my go to stop when passing through Mississippi
Clean restrooms and shower or fifteen dollars good customer service

locations.title: C & T Truck Stop
locations.content: C & T Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … No shower …

Medium-Large paved parking lot for semi trucks.  Newly renovated showers with 3 way shower heads!  Two are handicap accessible and one aims straight down from the ceiling.  I’m 6’10” and I fit with many inches yet of clearance which pretty …

If you buy fuel the shower is free , if not fueling , shower costs you 10 bucks. The double cheeseburger and fries is good, sometimes I get the chief salad.  Everything is good in the restaurant.  Ladys working inside work hard and are nice …
Perfect place for a Shower, Clean areas, Extremely nice and polite Employees, Great food options, and Delicious food cooked Fresh, It may take a while to cook, but it is very much so worth it!
Nice renovated restrooms and shower rooms. Large, paved truck parking lot. I did not fuel or eat here so I can't comment on that. Otherwise this place is good except they close at 10

It's great to have a place out in the middle of nowhere where they have home cooked meals and cheap fuel for truckers with shower facilities ....... I'd rather have a dollar from 1000 people than $200 from 5
Good food, good prices, friendly folks, you can usually find parking, and great showers with 3 shower heads.

I just got a plate here called the Red Neck breakfast and it was just great a lot of food and didn't cost a lot 6.99 and going for a shower in the morning and that's only 10.00 and it's very quiet here a must stop
Clean, polite, good food, clean hot shower. Good old-fashioned truckstop.
